messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

skill matrix export results issue sent tuesday skills export results issue hi when trying export results skills matrix get below error window below please advise regards

message.reasoning:

I'm leaning towards "Miscellaneous" as the most appropriate category, but I'm open to further refinement. I'm focusing on ensuring accuracy in my final selection.
